record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - December 17, 2007)

[Page: H15727]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, tomorrow, I have an appointment for eye surgery, which cannot be rescheduled.
Were I able to attend today's session in the House of Representatives, I would have voted "yea" on rollcall votes Nos. 1163, 1164, 1165, 1166, 1167, 1168, 1169, 1170, 1171, 1172 and 1173.
